Description

Buy Now, Pay Later: Secure your booking today with a non-refundable $200/person deposit, and we'll invoice you for the remaining balance 10 days before your stay.

This room includes:

• All-Inclusive Meals: Daily 2 Course Private Chef-Curated Meals are included in the whole experience!
•⁠  ⁠1 comfortable Double-sized bed.
•⁠  ⁠1 Twin-sized bed.
•⁠  ⁠WiFi.
•⁠  ⁠Air Conditioning and heating for your comfort.
•⁠  ⁠Access to shared bathroom and kitchen.
•⁠  ⁠Access to shared living room with Chromecast TV.
